content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"HELLO AND WELCOME ON BOARD!\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Weâ€™re delighted that you are joining our EPAM CoreLogic Team. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We hope you are ready to meet new colleagues and join new jobs, and to make it successfully, we prepared helpful guidance that we believe will help you to get onboarded faster and smoother. This is the general account onboarding module which will walk you through the customer background, account history and policies, account activities and some specific guidance how to get onboarded. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We hope you will have an amazing time working with us!\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":414909,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/7621fe02-3f11-4317-bc73-c22e994f027a/Onboarding-cuate.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/7621fe02-3f11-4317-bc73-c22e994f027a/Onboarding-cuate.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Onboarding-cuate.png\",\"name\":\"Onboarding-cuate.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"7621fe02-3f11-4317-bc73-c22e994f027a\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":575,\"height\":346},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
